name: Natural Resources Defense Council
goal: NRDC is a national non-profit legal and scientific environmental organization with offices in New York City, Washington, D.C., Santa Monica, San Francisco, Chicago, Missoula and Beijing, China. The organizationâ€™s work is aimed at protecting and enhancing the human and natural environment and the staff uses several different tools to achieve this goal, including legal action, scientific and environmental research, participation in administrative proceedings and citizen education programs. Our funding comes from foundations and more than 1.2 million members and activists throughout the country.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health
euInitiatives:
